name: CoopValor 2056
description:
Join your army in the most intense and realistic WW3 War Zone and reconquer Europe.

CoopValor 2056 is a modern warfare fps shooting game, set in World War 3, where all of Europe is destroyed and subjugated, only a few small resistance groups are left scattered across Europe, from Ukraine, Spain, France, Belgium to Germany. .

From your war zone you will have to gain ground, as you advance you will take your own resources and those of the enemy such as drones, tanks, helicopters, robot dogs and much more.

In the CoopValor 2056 shooter you will live the closest thing to a combat of a special forces soldier in the most intense military operations of the 3rd World War.

In the Beta there are only 10% of accessories, weapons, tanks, etc. of the game. In each weekly update I will upload more weapons, improvements and news until I reach all the props, tanks, etc. I'm uploading it in a controlled way so that I can follow up faster and more efficiently in case problems arise and thus  to solve them faster.

Gamestrilla will allocate 20% of each sale to social projects both locally and internationally. The first donations will be for the population of Ukraine through Ukrainian Organizations that are already on the ground and know what needs they prioritize. All donations can be tracked from the Gamestrilla donations page. Help me grow and make our Social Work section real!

Gamestrilla is a studio formed by one person with the dream of developing professional games.
